## \_deleteModelWithChildren() function

Responsible for deleting model with given id(s) and children with cascadeDelete set to true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _deleteModelWithChildren<TState extends UnknownState>(state: Immutable<TState>, stateProp: Immutable<Prop<TState>>, cfg: Immutable<{
    id?: unknown;
    ids?: unknown[];
}>): Immutable<Partial<TState>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | Immutable&lt;TState&gt; | The state containing model &amp; child state. |
|  stateProp | Immutable&lt;Prop&lt;TState&gt;&gt; | The state property of the model thats being deleted. |
|  cfg | Immutable&lt;{ id?: unknown; ids?: unknown\[\]; }&gt; | The id or ids of the model(s) to be deleted. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TState&gt;&gt;

Updated state with deletion applied.
